sampleQuotes.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans
sampleQuotes.author: John Lennon

sampleQuotes.quote: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
sampleQuotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

sampleQuotes.quote: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough
sampleQuotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

sampleQuotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing
sampleQuotes.author: Walt Disney

sampleQuotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams
sampleQuotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
